verses.verse: These are the words <WH1697> of the covenant <WH1285> which Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> to make <WH3772> with the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the land <WH776> of Moab, <WH4124> besides the covenant <WH1285> which he made <WH3772> with them in Horeb. <WH2722>

Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> to all Israel, <WH3478> and said <WH559> to them, <WH7200> You have seen all that Yahweh <WH3068> did <WH6213> before your eyes <WH5869> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> to Pharaoh, <WH6547> and to all his servants, <WH5650> and to all his land; <WH776>
the great <WH1419> trials <WH4531> which your eyes <WH5869> saw, <WH7200> the signs, <WH226> and those great <WH1419> wonders: <WH4159>
but Yahweh <WH3068> has not given <WH5414> you a heart <WH3820> to know, <WH3045> and eyes <WH5869> to see, <WH7200> and ears <WH241> to hear, <WH8085> to this day. <WH3117>

I have led <WH3212> you forty <WH705> years <WH8141> in the wilderness: <WH4057> your clothes <WH8008> have not grown old <WH1086> on you, <WH5275> and your shoes have not grown old <WH1086> on your feet. <WH7272>
You have not eaten <WH398> bread, <WH3899> neither have you drunk <WH8354> wine <WH3196> or strong drink; <WH7941> that you may know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh <WH3068> your God. <WH430>

When you came <WH935> to this place, <WH4725> Sihon <WH5511> the king <WH4428> of Heshbon, <WH2809> and Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan, <WH1316> came out <WH3318> against <WH7125> us to battle, <WH4421> and we struck them: <WH5221>

and we took <WH3947> their land, <WH776> and gave <WH5414> it for an inheritance <WH5159> to the Reubenites, <WH7206> and to the Gadites, <WH1425> and to the half <WH2677> - tribe <WH7626> of the Manassites. <WH4520>
Keep <WH8104> therefore the words <WH1697> of this covenant, <WH1285> and do <WH6213> them, <WH7919> that you may prosper in all that you do. <WH6213>

You stand <WH5324> this day <WH3117> all of you before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> your God; <WH430> your heads, <WH7218> your tribes, <WH7626> your elders, <WH2205> and your officers, <WH7860> even all the men <WH376> of Israel, <WH3478>

your little ones, <WH2945> your wives, <WH802> and your foreigner <WH1616> who is in <WH7130> the midst of your camps, <WH4264> from the one who cuts <WH2404> your wood <WH6086> to the one who draws <WH7579> your water; <WH4325>

that you may enter <WH5674> into the covenant <WH1285> of Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and into his oath, <WH423> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> makes <WH3772> with you this day; <WH3117>

that he may establish <WH6965> you this day <WH3117> to himself for a people, <WH5971> and that he may be to you a God, <WH430> as he spoke <WH1696> to you, <WH7650> and as he swore to your fathers, <WH1> to Abraham, <WH85> to Isaac, <WH3327> and to Jacob. <WH3290>
Neither with you only do I make <WH3772> this covenant <WH1285> and this oath, <WH423>
but with him who stands <WH5975> here with us this <WH3426> day <WH3117> before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> our God, <WH430> and also with him who is not here with us this day <WH3117>
(for you know <WH3045> how we lived <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> and how we came <WH5674> through <WH7130> the midst of the nations <WH1471> through which you passed; <WH7130>
and you have seen <WH7200> their abominations, <WH8251> and their idols, <WH1544> wood <WH6086> and stone, <WH68> silver <WH3701> and gold, <WH2091> which were among them);

lest there should be <WH3426> among you man, <WH376> or woman, <WH802> or family, <WH4940> or tribe, <WH7626> whose heart <WH3824> turns away <WH6437> this day <WH3117> from Yahweh <WH3068> our God, <WH430> to go <WH3212> to serve <WH5647> the gods <WH430> of those nations; <WH1471> lest there should be <WH3426> among you a root <WH8328> that bears <WH6509> gall <WH7219> and wormwood; <WH3939>

and it happen, <WH8085> when he hears the words <WH1697> of this curse, <WH423> that he bless <WH1288> himself in his heart, <WH3824> saying, <WH559> "I shall have peace, <WH7965> though <WH3588> I walk <WH3212> in the stubbornness <WH8307> of my heart, <WH3820> to destroy <WH5595> the moist <WH7302> with the dry. <WH6771>"

Yahweh <WH3068> will <WH14> not pardon <WH5545> him, <WH639> but then the anger of Yahweh <WH3068> and his jealousy <WH7068> will smoke <WH6225> against that man, <WH376> and all the curse <WH423> that is written <WH3789> in this book <WH5612> shall lie <WH7257> on him, <WH3068> and Yahweh will blot out <WH4229> his name <WH8034> from under the sky. <WH8064>

Yahweh <WH3068> will set him apart <WH914> to evil <WH7451> out of all the tribes <WH7626> of Israel, <WH3478> according to all the curses <WH423> of the covenant <WH1285> that is written <WH3789> in this book <WH5612> of the law. <WH8451>

The generation <WH1755> to come, <WH314> your children <WH1121> who shall rise up <WH6965> after <WH310> you, <WH5237> and the foreigner who shall come <WH935> from a far <WH7350> land, <WH776> shall say, <WH559> when they see <WH7200> the plagues <WH4347> of that land, <WH776> and the sicknesses <WH8463> with which Yahweh <WH3068> has made it sick; <WH2470>

and that the whole land <WH776> of it is sulfur, <WH1614> salt, <WH4417> and burning, <WH8316> that it is not sown, <WH2232> nor bears, <WH6779> nor any grass <WH6212> grows <WH5927> therein, <WH4114> like the overthrow of Sodom <WH5467> and Gomorrah, <WH6017> Admah <WH126> and Zeboiim, <WH6636> which Yahweh <WH3068> overthrew <WH2015> in his anger, <WH639> and in his wrath: <WH2534>
even all the nations <WH1471> shall say, <WH559> "Why has Yahweh <WH3068> done <WH6213> thus to this land? <WH776> What does the heat <WH2750> of this great <WH1419> anger mean? <WH639>"

Then men shall say, <WH559> "Because they forsook the covenant <WH1285> of Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of their fathers, <WH1> which he made <WH3772> with them when he brought them forth <WH3318> out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714>
and went <WH3212> and served <WH5647> other <WH312> gods, <WH430> and worshiped <WH7812> them, <WH430> gods that they didn't <WH3045> know, and that he had not given to them: <WH2505>
therefore the anger <WH639> of Yahweh <WH3068> was kindled <WH2734> against this land, <WH776> to bring <WH935> on it all the curse <WH7045> that is written <WH3789> in this book; <WH5612>

and Yahweh <WH3068> rooted <WH5428> them out of their land <WH127> in anger, <WH639> and in wrath, <WH2534> and in great <WH1419> indignation, <WH7110> and cast <WH7993> them into another <WH312> land, <WH776> as at this day. <WH3117>"

The secret <WH5641> things belong to Yahweh <WH3068> our God; <WH430> but the things that are revealed <WH1540> belong to us and to our children <WH1121> forever, <WH5769> that we may do <WH6213> all the words <WH1697> of this law. <WH8451>
